item.title: AEM Franklin — creating a simple custom accordion block
item.description:
What is Franklin?

AEM Franklin is a new product by Adobe, still in an early beta stage. It’s marketed as a lightweight framework, providing the ability to create sites that are fast, quick to set up with an interesting and easy way to author content via Google docs.

AEM Franklin uses the concept of blocks which is the equivalent of components in this lightweight framework. A block is simply a reusable piece that can be used across the website on different pages.
